chapter.title: Nonogramm Chooser
chapter.para:
To start a new game you can choose a nonogram to play with the nonogram chooser shown in
. Three sources for nonograms are available.

Under "random nonograms" automatically generated nonograms can be found. The last generated and played nonograms are saved and shown on the right side of the window. To generate a new random nonogram click with the right mouse button on "Nonogram by seed" and choose "New seed..." in the context menu. After that you are requested to input a string of characters. A generated nonogram for the same characters looks always the same.

Including the FreeNono release are some nonograms. These are found under "Local Nonograms" and are organized in courses. Courses contain similar nonograms, e.g. all nonograms in the course "Kanji Class" show japanese kanji characters.
The folder "User Nonograms" shows all nonograms copied into the directory "nonograms" inside the config directory of FreeNono.
